name: getAllProjectTypes
description:
Returns all [project types](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/Var1Nw), whether or not the instance has a valid license for each type.

This operation can be accessed anonymously.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** None.

$ul: **color**: The color of the project type.
**descriptionI18nKey**: The key of the project type's description.
**formattedKey**: The formatted key of the project type.
**icon**: The icon of the project type.
**key**: The key of the project type.
